analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0xdf9aa6ecf3e508afd18da3bbb2ac4d5aa9a90ead.sol:
	Contract CBTVToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xdf9aa6ecf3e508afd18da3bbb2ac4d5aa9a90ead.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0xdf9aa6ecf3e508afd18da3bbb2ac4d5aa9a90ead.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
